plot: A documentary looking at the BBC Young Musician of the Year award for 1984. We see how the contestants are trained and chosen and Margaret Percy meets the previous winner Anna Markland.
title: Young Musician of the Year 1984
plot_es: A documentary looking at the BBC Young Musician of the Year award for 1984. We see how the contestants are trained and chosen and Margaret Percy meets the previous winner Anna Markland.
plot_en: A documentary looking at the BBC Young Musician of the Year award for 1984. We see how the contestants are trained and chosen and Margaret Percy meets the previous winner Anna Markland.
